question: 発酵
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>ferment</kanji> something it makes a <kanji>departure</kanji> from what it originally was and transforms during <vocabulary>fermentation</vocabulary> into something new.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
